content.value:
Got a random box of groceries delivered (thanks @Morrisons). As a result just had a video call with my Mum where I said "You know how I'm a grown adult in her 40s? Is this a lettuce or a cabbage?"

So how's your lockdown going?
content.html: Got a random box of groceries delivered (thanks @Morrisons). As a result just had a video call with my Mum where I said "You know how I'm a grown adult in her 40s? Is this a lettuce or a cabbage?" So how's your lockdown going?
